faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Learn more about ThinkForward AI
faq.q1: How does ThinkForward AI help immigration consultants improve efficiency?
faq.a1: Our AI system can automatically analyze documents, fill out forms, provide professional advice, helping consultants save up to 60% of their time, focusing on providing more valuable services to clients.
faq.q2: Do I need a technical background to use ThinkForward AI?
faq.a2: No, you don't. Our platform is designed to be simple and intuitive, so anyone can easily use it without any special technical knowledge.
faq.a3: Yes, we take data security very seriously. All data is stored encrypted and follows strict privacy protection policies, complying with international data protection standards.
faq.q4: Can I try it for free?
faq.a4: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for you to fully experience all the platform features without needing a credit card.
faq.q5: How can I get support if I need help?
faq.a5: We provide multiple support channels, including online documentation, email support, and real-time chat. Enterprise users also have access to dedicated customer manager support.
